Description: The following statement contains a magic number: foreach (ItemDefinition definition in engine.Definitions.GetDefinitions())             {                 if (IsContentPage(definition))                 {                     var tagEditable = new EditableTagsAttribute();                     tagEditable.Name = "Tags";                     tagEditable.SortOrder = 500;                     if (usingTemplates)                         tagEditable.ContainerName = "content";                      definition.Add(tagEditable);                 }             }
